name: Africa as a Geopolitical Battleground
title: Africa as a Geopolitical Battleground
points: Growing influence of rival powers in the region.
details: Africa's strategic importance is growing, with increased competition from global powers to secure resources and influence.

name: The Rise of BRICS
title: The Rise of BRICS
points: Shift in global economic power centers.
Opportunities for UAE to diversify partnerships.
details: The expansion of BRICS poses a challenge to traditional global economic structures, offering new opportunities for collaboration.

name: Saudi Arabia and Iran Shock Alliance
title: Saudi Arabia and Iran Shock Alliance

title: Collision of Flashpoints
points: Challenges to UAE's neutral diplomatic stance.
details: Simultaneous global conflicts create risks of regional spillovers, testing UAE's diplomatic agility.

name: Trump's Geopolitical Tsunami
title: Trump's Geopolitical Tsunami
details: Trump's return to influence in US politics could lead to significant geopolitical shifts and challenges for allies.

name: The Rise of Superintelligence
title: The Rise of Superintelligence
details: The advent of superintelligent AI poses significant challenges for global governance and economic stability.

title: China Breaks Quantum Cryptography

details: China's advancements in quantum cryptography could render current encryption systems obsolete, requiring urgent countermeasures.

name: Ultra-Advanced Technology
title: Ultra-Advanced Technology

details: Breakthroughs in ultra-advanced technology could disrupt existing industries, offering opportunities and challenges for the UAE.

details: Volt Typhoon represents a sophisticated cyber threat targeting critical infrastructure, requiring proactive countermeasures.

title: Rise of AI War Machines
details: The rise of AI-powered weaponry could reshape the nature of warfare, requiring adaptive strategies.

name: Weaponization of Space
title: Weaponization of Space

title: Rise of Financial Multiverses

name: Unregulated Biotech Breakthroughs
